verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w count|strong="H5608"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* morrow \w after|strong="H4283"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, wherein \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w offered|strong="H8573"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sheaf|strong="H6016"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7676"\w*.
